column2: IOWA DMV TEST
column4: Iowa

column2: Question Text
column4: Answer1 Text
column8: Answer3 Text

column2: 1. Examples of proper glass maintenance include:
column4: Keeping your windows clean and clear.
column8: Making sure there is enough windshield fluid in the reservoir.

column2: 2. An octagonal sign means that drivers must:
column4: respect the posted speed limit.
column6: come to a complete stop at the marked stop line.
column8: be aware possible hazards ahead.

column2: 3. What should you do if you see smoke come from under the hood?
column4: Pull off the road and park your vehicle. Turn off the ignition, get away from the car and call the fire department.
column6: Try to fight the fire yourself.
column8: Jump off your car immediately, if it is safe to do so.
column10: Call the fire department and then pull off the road and park your vehicle.

column2: 4. Where must you position your vehicle when you prepare to make a left turn from a two-way roadway into a one-way roadway?
column4: As close as possible to the center line.
column6: As far to the right as possible.
column8: On the right curb.

column2: 5. When making a turn, drivers must _____ their speed.
column4: increase
column8: maintain

column2: 6. If your gas pedal is stuck, you should:
column4: turn off the ignition if your vehicle has power steering.
column6: ease your foot off the gas pedal and brake gently.
column8: hook your shoe under the pedal and see if you can free it. If not, shift into neutral and use the brake to slow your vehicle and get off the road.
column10: try pumping it to increase pressure.

column2: 7. A red octagon shaped sign is a ______ sign.
column4: One way
column8: Stop

column2: 8. You may drive faster than the posted speed limit:
column4: when your lane is empty.
column8: when passing another vehicle, as long as it is safe to do so.

column2: 9. This road sign means:
column4: Side road ahead
column8: Dangerous curve

column2: 10. To drive defensively, you must:
column4: keep your eyes moving.
column8: keep one hand on the steering wheel.
column10: use the vehicle ahead as your only points of focus.

column2: 11. This road sign means:
column4: No left turn
column8: No U-turns

column2: 12. Driving at excessive speed:
column4: does not increase the chance of a crash.
column8: improves your reaction time.

column2: 13. When driving in a construction zone you should:
column4: come to a complete stop and check road conditions.
column8: slightly increase your speed.

column2: 14. There is no crosswalk and a pedestrian is crossing your lane ahead. You should:
column4: slow down as you pass the pedestrian.
column6: stop and let the pedestrian finish crossing the street.
column8: make eye contact and then pass the pedestrian.

column2: 15. This sign means:
column4: Warning: a bikeway crosses the roadway ahead.
column6: The lane ahead is reserved for bicycles.
column8: Bicycles should yield to vehicles ahead.

column2: 16. When you make a left turn from a one-way road into a one-way road, if the road you enter has two lanes, you:
column4: must go to the next intersection.
column6: must turn into its left lane.
column8: can not turn left.
column10: must turn into its right lane.

column2: 17. Drivers under 21 years of age are considered to be driving under the influence if their blood alcohol concentration (BAC) is:
column4: .02% or higher.
column8: .10% or higher.

column2: 18. This road sign means:
column4: Bicycle parking ahead
column6: Bicycles cross or ride beside traffic
column8: Yield right-of-way to bicycles
column10: Bicycles have the same rights as other vehicles

column2: 19. This road sign means:
column4: Watch for trucks entering from the side
column8: Merging traffic

column2: 20. This road sign means:
column4: All traffic must turn right at next intersection
column8: Right turn on red light permitted

column2: 21. This is the shape and color of a ________ sign.
column4: do not enter
column8: wrong Way

column2: 22. After you stop for a school bus, you must:
column4: turn off your engine.
column6: wait until the red lights stop flashing.
column8: pass the bus before the red lights stop flashing.

column2: 23. This sign means:
column4: Shopping centre ahead.
column6: Business area nearby. Watch for business people.
column8: The driver is near a school and should watch for children.
column10: There is a work zone ahead. Watch for workers.

column2: 24. This road sign means:
column4: Steep downgrade ahead
column8: Left lane must turn left
column10: Trucks have the right of way

column2: 25. This sign means:
column4: No parking between 8:30 AM and 5:30 PM.
column6: Parking is not allowed at 8:30 AM and at 5:30 PM
column8: You can only park between 8:30 AM and 5:30 PM.

column2: 26. When meeting a car with blinding headlights, you should:
column4: look toward the right side of the road.
column6: use your emergency flashers to warn the other driver.
column8: look toward the left side of the road.
column10: dim your lights, then speed up and pass quickly.

column2: 27. You go with a group of friends to a social event, and you plan to have a few drinks. You should:
column4: stop drinking several minutes before you intend to leave.
column6: arrange to ride home with a friend who does not drink.
column8: make alcohol the focus of the event.
column10: avoid alternating between drinks with alcohol and drinks without any alcohol.

column2: 28. Drinking alcohol while taking drugs:
column4: reduces the effects of the drug or medicine.
column6: reduces the effects of the alcohol.
column8: has no effect, they are different substances.
column10: could multiply the effects of the alcohol.

column2: 29. This sign means:
column4: The minimum speed limit is 45 MPH.
column6: The recommended speed limit is 45 MPH.
column8: Take route 45 if you are driving at night.
column10: The night-time speed limit is 45 MPH.

column2: 30. The extra space in front of a large truck is needed for:
column4: other drivers when they want to pass the truck.
column6: other drivers when merging onto a freeway.
column8: the truck driver to stop the vehicle.

column2: 31. This road sign means:
column4: Watch for vehicles entering from the side
column8: Divided highway ahead

column2: 32. When in a motor vehicle on a highway, it is:
column4: illegal to possess an open container of alcohol in the passenger compartment.
column6: illegal to drink from, but permissible to transport, open containers of alcohol in the passenger compartment.
column8: acceptable to drink alcoholic beverages if you are not driving.
column10: permissible to drink a moderate amount of alcohol when driving with a passenger.

column2: 33. The only effective way to reduce your blood alcohol content (BAC) is:
column4: fresh air.
column8: drinking coffee.
column10: not to drink over a period of time.

column2: 34. This road sign means:
column4: Do not enter
column8: Yield the right-of-way

column2: 35. The yield sign means:
column4: The traffic light will soon be red.
column6: Drive with caution in wet weather.
column8: Slow down and give vehicles crossing your path the right-of-way.
column10: You must come to a complete stop.
